text: Klára Fehér (21 May 1919 – 11 September 1996) was a Hungarian writer. ==Life== Fehér was born in Újpest in 1919. She attended Budapest University from 1945 to 1948 and at the same time she wrote for a newspaper. In 1979 she became a freelance writer and wrote in a number of genres including work for children and books co-authored with her husband. She married László Nemes who was also a writer. Fehér died in Budapest in 1996 and her husband founded a prize for literature in her name. ==Works== * Narkózis: regény, 1969 * And don't miss Hungary!, 1976 * A tenger : regény, 1956 * Budapest, 1962 * Bezzeg az én időmben; regény, 1966 * Nem vagyunk ördögök, 1968 * Hová álljanak a belgák? : regény, 1988 * Oxygénia, 1974 * Ich bekomme eine Insel, 1975 * Négy nap a paradicsomban : regény, 1976 ==References== Category:1919 births Category:1996 deaths Category:People from Újpest Category:20th-century Hungarian writers Category:Budapest University alumni Category:20th-century Hungarian women writers
title: Klára Fehér
